alert.note: Alert for Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 2:45PM CDT until August 08 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Wright County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 245 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hartville, or 20 miles northwest of Mountain Grove, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dawson... Hartville... Manes... Graff... Grovespring... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
